summary: Comprehensive testing of CQIL (Continuous Quality & Integrity Layer) implementation including IntegrityBar, Adam QA Dashboard, Weather/DOL Verification, and Sales Enablement pages. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: CQIL health endpoint properly checks 5 components: database, api_routes, integrations, data_integrity, permissions
IntegrityBar correctly shows OPERATIONAL/DEGRADED/CRITICAL status based on component health
Adam dashboard properly integrates with CQIL APIs for real-time health monitoring
Release gate logic correctly calculates CLEAR/WARNING/BLOCKED based on P0/P1 issue counts
Weather/DOL Verification page has proper form validation and carrier-defensible badge
Sales Enablement has 4 loss types (Wind, Hail, Water, Fire) with step-by-step guided flows
seed_data_creation: None - CQIL uses real-time health checks
context_for_next_testing_agent: CQIL implementation fully tested. IntegrityBar shows at top of page for admin users only. Adam dashboard at /adam route has Dashboard/Tests/Reports tabs with real CQIL integration.

cqil_health_api.details: Returns overall_status (green/yellow/red), 5 components with status, latency, and messages

cqil_metrics_api.details: Returns P0/P1/P2 issue counts, release_gate status (clear/warning/blocked)

cqil_issues_api.details: Returns list of integrity issues (currently empty)

cqil_break_reports_api.details: Returns list of break reports (currently empty)

cqil_routes_audit_api.details: Returns total_routes count and list of all registered routes

integrity_bar_component.details: Shows OPERATIONAL status with green indicator, expandable to show all 5 health components

integrity_bar_admin_only.details: IntegrityBar only renders for admin users (isAdmin prop check)

adam_dashboard.details: Dashboard tab shows 5 health components, P0/P1/P2 issue cards, Quick Actions

adam_tests_tab.details: Tests tab has Run Tests button, test configuration dropdown, shows results (16 total, 14 passed, 2 warnings)

adam_reports_tab.details: Reports tab shows break reports from The Sentinel (currently 0 reports)

adam_release_gate.details: Shows CLEAR TO RELEASE status (green) when no P0/P1 issues

weather_verification_page.details: Form with address, city, state, date inputs. Verify Date of Loss button. Carrier-Defensible badge.

sales_enablement_page.details: 4 loss types (Wind, Hail, Water, Fire), Quick Door Knock Script, Objection Handling, Step-by-step guided flows

cqil_endpoints.metrics: ✅ Working - Returns P0=0, P1=0, P2=0, release_gate=clear
